page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are lots of jobs you can do in our area such as : shopkeeper, bartender, plumber, secretary, school staff, window cleaner, milkman, paperboy, engineer, and many more. In Carleton there are 27 shops and 3 are new ones. Someone interviewed a market gardener and this is what they found out. The greenhouses cover 1870 square metres. He employs 3 people, 2 part-time. The nursery is split into 3 parts: Part 1 - 3200 early tomatoes, 17000 lettuce; Part 2 - 1000 tomatoes and 12000 lettuce; Part 3 - 2000 tomatoes and 5000 lettuce. He waters his tomato plants once a day with diluted feed in water. He does not sell all his stocks but sends it to wholesale outlets. His lettuce take 8-10 weeks to grow, whilst his tomatoes take about 12 weeks to grow.
